Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Phylloseptin-Co (PS-Co; XXA; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals, UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide shows 94.73% similarity toPhylloseptin-1.1TR. It only differs from AP2989 at position 4 (M for this peptide and L for AP2989: Phylloseptin-1.1TR).Activity: Active against S. aureus (MIC 8 ug/ml), E.coli (MIC 128 ug/ml)), C. albicans (MIC 16 ug/ml)). Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Yang N, Li L, Wu D, Gao Y, Xi X, Zhou M, Wang L, Chen T, Shaw C.2016
Literature Information.Title: Discovery of Novel Bacterial Cell-Penetrating Phylloseptins in Defensive Skin Secretions of the South American Hylid Frogs, Phyllomedusa duellmani and Phyllomedusa coelestis.
